trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around February 18th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a picture of the full moon in Miami and noticed an orb in my camera. I could not see it with my bare eyes so I kept shooting. I even video taped it from my I-phone. I would have kept watching but my wife kept annoying me about something else that distracted me. Afterward I decided to view it on the flat screen. As I was doing that I enlarged the photo and scanned thru it. It is an obvious orb that has a glowing light around it. I looked thru the whole screen and can see different light patterns. Some barely visible circular objects with light surrounding the outer borders of it. I am not someone who knows anything about these things or the heavens. So I am sending these pictures to you for your advice. THIS IS NOT A HOAX!!!
Summary: I was taking a picture of the full moon and noticed an orb in my camera.
